df.set_index('First_col').T.plot(kind='bar', stacked=True,figsize=(16,8))


# Here df has column stop_time and drugs_related_stop
# stop_time = 05:10   and drugs_related_stop = False
df['stop_time'] = pd.to_datetime(df.stop_datetime, format="%H:%S")
df.groupby(df.stop_time.dt.hour).drugs_related_stop.sum().plot(kind='bar')

# labels
ax.set(xlabel='Purchase Month', ylabel='Item Cogs',title='Monthly Item COGS')
